description:
Let`s take one step forward and try it!
http://anidb.net/ch86707 [Yuusaku] hates standing out, and at his school he doesn`t. However, Yuusaku starts meeting others through duels, and starts moving forward.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
The town that developed the newest network - Den City. There, in "LINK VRAINS," the VR space managed by SOL Technology, people Duel day and night. Our hero, Fuji Yuusaku, is a cool high schooler who posses outstanding powers of observation.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuusaku manages to capture the the Mysterious Lifeform as he pursues the hacker group "the Knights of Hanoi." To defeat the Knights, he logs in to the VR space "LINK VRAINS" as "Playmaker" and challenges them to a Duel with the Mysterious Lifeform as a hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Greif nach dem Wind! Storm Access

REGULAR.description:
Yuusaku begins investigating the information hidden within the Mysterious Lifeform. Meanwhile, his Duel with the Knights of Hanoi is attracting attention all over the network, and everyone is saying Playmaker is the hero who saved LINK VRAINS.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ファースト・コンタクト

REGULAR.description:
A Knight of Hanoi suddenly appears in the VR space, LINK VRAINS. The Knight`s true identity is Go Onizuka - a charismatic Duelist who has his eye on Playmaker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: カリスマデュエリストGo鬼塚

REGULAR.description:
Go Onizuka Duels almost as though he were in a pro-wrestling match, exaggerating how dire his circumstances are, to delight and entertain the crowd. Aware his own calm and rational  style is vastly different, Playmaker finds himself becoming interested in Go Onizuka`s play style.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鳴動のスリーカウント

REGULAR.description:
Zaizen Aoi is making a name for herself in LINK VRAINS as the charismatic Duelist Blue Angel. To gain the recognition of her holder brother, Zaizen Akira, she challenges Playmaker to a Duel in front of everyone in LINK VRIANS.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アイドル!! ブルーエンジェル

REGULAR.description:
Yuusuke gets the feeling that the Knights of Hanoi are backing Blue Angel and accepts her challenge to try to discover her true motives. Blue Angels tactics, using effect damage, steadily drive Playmaker into a corner...
Source: crunchyroll

The effects of the program set up by the Knights of Hanoi have sent Zaizen Aoi into a coma. Yuusuke feels responsible for getting her caught up in his fight against the Knights and sets out with Kusanagi and the others to investigate the cause.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker wagers the program that can remove the virus eating away at Aoi along with an AI known as Ignis in a Duel with Revolver. Revolver calls Cracking Dragon which Playmaker quickly crushes with the Link Monsters he`s obtained.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Feind, den ich gesucht habe

REGULAR.description:
Revolver activates a powerful skill and uses the overwhelming power he obtains to launch a fierce attack. In the face of it, all Playmaker can do is defend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 衝撃! サイバース消失

REGULAR.description:
Stunned by the truth revealed by Revolver, Playmaker takes a massive hit from Revoler`s ace monster, Barrel-load Dragon, and collapses. As his consciousness fades, a mysterious voice reverberates through his mind, waking him up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 轟く弾倉 ヴァレルロード

REGULAR.description:
Accompanied by Firewall Dragon, Playmaker gathers the last of his strength to confront Revolver`s Barrel-load Dragon. Playmaker vows revenge for what happened in the past. Revolver plots to eradicate "Ignis."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鉄壁の守護竜 ファイアウォール

REGULAR.description:
His fierce battle with Revolver ended, Yuusaku and Kusanagi analyze information regarding Ignis. Meanwhile, in LINK VRAINS, Ghost Girl, a mysterious Duelist who saw Playmaker, is interviewed.
Source: crunchyroll

Interested in the incident from 10 years ago, Ghost Girl challenges Playmaker to a Duel with Ai as the stakes. When he learns that, if he wins, he`ll gain a program that will help him infiltrate SOL Technology`s database, Yuusaku heads into LINK VRAINS.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴーストガールの誘い

REGULAR.description:
Ghost Girl opens the Duel with phantasmagorical tactics making the battle difficult to read. Playmaker calmly analyzes her movements and looks for a chance to use Storm Access.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Altergeist That Hides in the Darkness
Sich in der Dunkelheit versteckender Altergeist
闇に忍ぶオルターガイスト

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker infiltrates SOL Technology`s mother computer looking for information on the incident from 10 years ago and heads for a certain data bank deep within the system, but a Duel AI program stands in his way.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker is blocked by AI programs. Blue Angel rushes to his side. With her help, Playmaker manages to escape and hurries deeper into the mother computer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 完全無欠のAIデュエリスト

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker infiltrates SOL Technology`s data banks. Waiting for him is Zaizen Akira. He`s there to try to cool Playmaker`s burning desire for revenge, but his words don`t get through to him.
Source: crunchyroll

Zaizen Akira displays brilliant tactics through his skillful use of the Tindangle deck. Playmaker counters with the Cybers. As the fierce battle rages on inside the data bank, Akira begins to speak about the events of 10 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

Using every means at his disposal, Zaizen Akira corners Playmaker. But Playmaker calls up the last of his strength and tries to turn the tables in one move with a series of link summons.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuusaku and Kusanagi make progress in analyzing the data from SOL Technology. They learn a new truth about the events of 10 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

In Den City, a mysterious phenomenon known as "Anothers" is happening over and over. It`s a terrifying condition where people can`t log out of LINK VRAINS and are left unconscious in the real world.
Source: crunchyroll

To save a boy who has fallen victim to an Anothers incident, Go Onizuka confronts a criminal calling himself Doctor Genome.
Source: crunchyroll

Doctor Genome uses his Helix tactics to turn the Gouki`s powerful attacks against them. This strategy puts Go Onizuka in a desperate situation with seemingly no way out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダークマスクが背負う宿命

REGULAR.description:
When Aoi learns of the fierce battle between Playmaker and the Knights of Hanoi, she is torn between her desire to fight as Blue Angel and her promise to her brother not to log into LINK VRAINS.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウィルスデッキ・オペレーション

REGULAR.description:
With her Trickster deck completely locked away, Blue Angel takes tremendous damage from Baila`s Dark Mummy attacks. Knowing the insane risk, and with no other way out, she stakes everything on one last chance...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 希望を導くスリー・ドロー

REGULAR.description:
With the effects of the "Another" incidents reaching into the real world, people are scared and LINK VRAINS remains on high alert. Amidst all this, Shima Naoki yearns for LINK VRAINS more than the average person, and a certain trigger causes him to stand against the Knights of Hanoi!
Source: crunchyroll

Shima has been taken hostage, and Playmaker has been called out by the mastermind behind the "Another" incidents - Faust. Using monsters he calls Motor Worms, he blocks Playmaker`s link summons with tactics eerier than any seen before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Commander of the Three Knights

REGULAR.description:
The Knights of Hanoi`s evil influence doesn`t stop at LINK VRAINS. It extends into the real world too. Sensing an impending crisis, Kusanagi begins creating records on the connections between the Knights of Hanoi and the Lost Incident as well as the truth behind the "Another" incidents occurring in Den City...
Source: crunchyroll

Yuusaku begins to wonder why Revolver didn`t show during the Another incidents. When Yuusaku heads into LINK VRAINS to investigate, he encounters Ghost Girl, who is investigating the same thing.
Source: crunchyroll

A Duel begins between Ghost Girl, who was investigating the lower levels of LINK VRAINS, and Revolver, who appeared before her. She pulls out Topologic Bomber Dragon, with its powerful effects, and link summons her trump card...
Source: crunchyroll

Strange towers have suddenly sprung up in LINK VRAINS, and there`s been a string of incidents where Duelists have been digitized. Using the information entrusted to him by Ghost Girl, Playmaker heads into LINK VRAINS.
Source: crunchyroll

Blue Angel presses in hard with her Trickster deck, but her attacks don`t affect Specter, who is protected by Saint Avalon. Blue Angel launches a sure-fire knockout combo against Specter, but he just smiles...
Source: crunchyroll

Every time Specter`s Saint Avalon evolves, Blue Angel is backed into a corner. In the midst of this grueling Duel where her every move is steadily blocked, Blue Angel thinks of a crazy plan to break through Specter`s cast-iron defenses.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker heads to the Tower of Hanoi to prevent the collapse of LINK VRAINS, but Specter stands in his way. Playmaker tries for big damage with his Cybers, but his attack is blocked by a Saint Avalon combo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もう一つのロスト事件

REGULAR.description:
The brutal Saint Avalon combo continues to heal any damage Specter receives while also summoning Saint Vines. Even in the face of all this, Playmaker does not yield in his attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

With his ace monster, Xcode Talker, Playmaker is able to endure through fierce attacks from the Saint Vines. In order to take him down, Saint Avalon is nearing its final stage of evolution.
Source: crunchyroll

As the threat from the Tower of Hanoi creeps, moment by moment, closer to LINK VRAINS, Revolver thinks back on the battles fought to this point, and finds his resolve stronger than ever. Carrying on Dr. Kogami`s will, he moves to execute the plan.
Source: crunchyroll

The Tower of Hanoi nears completion as it swallows every part of LINK VRAINS. As the time limit approaches, Go Onizuka heads for the tower and faces off against Revolver.
Source: crunchyroll

Go Onizuka`s monsters have been destroyed one after another though Revolver`s tactics. His indomitable will to fight pushes him back to his feet, and, in this desperate situation with no apparent means of escape, he summons his ace monster, Gouki the Giant Ogre!
Source: crunchyroll

The Tower of Hanoi is nearly complete, and standing before it, Revolver finally faces off against his destined foe, Playmaker. The fate of the collapsing network and the truth behind the Lost Incident all rest on this last battle. It begins...
Source: crunchyroll

After Playmaker manages to withstand the brutal attacks from Revolver`s link monsters, he senses the presence of monsters inside the Tower of Hanoi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スターダスト・ロードの導き

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker realizes Revolver`s true identity in the middle of the Duel, but a sudden shockwave from inside the Data Storm forces him to log out.
Source: crunchyroll

Having learned the truth the Ignis had hidden and the truth behind the Lost Incident, Playmaker tries to convince Revolver to stop the completion of the Tower of Hanoi.
Source: crunchyroll

As Revolver`s fierce attacks continue, Playmaker prepares a counterattack using the power of multiple Code Talkers. Revolver replies by summoning his ace monster, Barrel-load Dragon.
Source: crunchyroll

With only a few life points left, Playmaker and Ai have their backs to the wall, but neither of them have given up. To overcome Revolver`s flawless tactics, Playmaker is betting everything he`s got on his final Draw.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Circuit that Draws the Future
未来を描き出すサーキット

REGULAR.description: Peace has returned thanks to Playmaker`s efforts. However, Link Vrains still suffered heavy damage due to Hanoi`s plan. Thus, Sol Technologies rebuilds it into New Link Vrains. The newly rebuilt Dueling platform has brought a lot of excitement to many. However, in New Link Vrains, Playmaker is a wanted man, and has a bounty on his head…

Playmaker chases after the mysterious individual who attacked Jin, and challenges him to a Duel. However, he has a hard time trying to deal with the mysterious man’s never-before-seen cards. In order to achieve victory, Playmaker uses the new card he received from Ai to counterattack!

As Playmaker chases after Bowman, the Duelist who stole Jin’s consciousness, two Duelists appear before him and block his path. However, a mysterious Duelist called Soulburner then shows up to help Playmaker. And what’s more… Soulburner also has an Ignis in his Duel Disk!

titles.title: 炎をまといし決闘者[デュエリスト]

REGULAR.description:
Homura Takeru has transferred into the same school as Yuusaku. He is also the Duelist called Soulburner who helped Playmaker.
Source: crunchyroll

Go Onizuka has become a bounty hunter for SOL Technology. He finds Playmaker and the Ignis Ai, who are on the wanted list, and forces them into a Duel.
Source: crunchyroll

Soulburner withstands the fierce attacks of Go Onizuka`s Dinowrestler deck through the effects of his Salamangreat monsters. Go presses harder to prove he is the strongest.
Source: crunchyroll

With a bounty on his head, Playmaker is forced into a Duel with the bounty hunter Blood Shepherd. Predicting Playmaker`s battle lineup, he launches coordinated combos with his Drone deck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 賞金稼ぎ[バウンティーハンター] ブラッドシェパード

REGULAR.description:
Blood Shepherd has exhaustively researched Playmaker`s deck. His Drone deck renders Playmaker completely helpless.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 戦慄のバトルドローン

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker and Soulburner visit a cliff where the wind blows fiercely. A mysterious force leads them to ruins which they begin to explore.
Source: crunchyroll

Soulburner accepts a request from the Ignis of Wind. He begins a Duel against Blue Girl, who has trespassed on the area of wind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 初陣! ブルーガール

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker has finally discovered Bowman`s location. He challenges him to a Duel to recover Kusanagi Jin`s consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker has taken a huge amount of damage from the transformed Bowman`s fierce attacks. His burning drive to win gets him back on his feet and he starts building a lineup to break through the brutal Hi-drive attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

After the "Another" incidents which sent Den City into a panic, one of the masterminds behind the plot, Baila, one of Hanoi`s Three Knights, was sent to a detention facility and imprisoned. There, while under strict surveillance, she is visited by a certain man...
Source: crunchyroll

Bessho Emma and Zaizen Aki are looking into Playmaker`s true identity. They focus their attention on Shima Naoki, who claims to be a close friend of Playmaker`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 敗北のブレイヴ・マックス

REGULAR.description:
As the people of the prison watch, Yuuya and Tokumatsu Choujirou fight a heated Duel! Tokumatsu presses Yuuya with his "Tokumatsu Victory Combo" which whittles away LP when he draws it, and declares he will win the Duel! Yuuya waits for his chance, trusting in a miracle, and through the Duel, Choujirou`s mindset begins to change?!
Source: crunchyroll

The inmates` excitement at the revival of "Enjoy Choujirou" continues. Since the Duel between Yuuya and Tokumatsu, the inmates seem energized. Shinji approaches Yuuya with the idea of entering the "Great Entertainment Duel Tournament" held in the prison. The truth is that Crow and Shinji are planning a jailbreak...!!
Source: crunchyroll

As Yuuya and the others head for the outside, the squad chasing them summon Goyou monsters cornering them! They`re trapped with seemingly no way out, then Gonegenzaka and Kurosaki appear!! With perfect teamwork, Yuuya and the others counter-attack. Just as they think they`ve finally escaped, Security chief Rojet appears to block their way...!!
Source: crunchyroll

In order to prove their alliance to the Council, Yuuya and the other Lancers participate in the Friendship Cup at Reiji`s suggestion. On top of which, Yuuya is ordered to participate in an exhibition match on the eve of the tournament where his opponent is King, Jack Atlas...! The crowd`s fevered excitement engulfs the arena where Yuuya is astonished by the force of Jack`s presence. He tries to hold true to his entertainment Dueling, but...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ターニング・ポイント

REGULAR.description:
The duel between Yuuya and Jack has set the people of City`s hearts afire. Meanwhile, Yuuya thinks Jack`s words to him, "your Duels are only about your own satisfaction," might have and what they might have meant. Just then, a boy holding a card appears before Yuuya... And, at the Duel Palace, the participants of the Friendship Cup are introduced...!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuuya takes the card handed to him by the boy, Sam. Meanwhile, at the Duel Palace, the tournament begins! The first match is Crow`s Black Feathers vs Gongenzaka`s Superheavy Samurai!! Bewildered by his first riding Duel, Gongenzaka glances to the side to find Crow`s Black Bird speeding into a good position. At the same time, Frank and the others, wanting to cheer on Crow, sneak into the arena...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Crow and Gongenzaka`s Duel drove the crowd wild, and through it, they understand each other better. At the same time, Tokumatsu visits Yuuya`s room to tell him what happens to the defeated Duelists in the Friendship Cup... Meanwhile, at the Duel Palace, the next match-up is announced. The names called are Shinji and Tsukikage...! Reiji has a plan, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Ai has suddenly disappeared from the duel disk. Realizing that other Ignis would know why this happened, Playmaker heads into LINK VRAINS to search for Ai.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to exterminate the Ignis, Revolver launches an attack on Windy and the others. Trying to stop a war between humans and Ignis, Playmaker tries to convince Revolver to stop.
Source: crunchyroll

Revolver is driven into a corner by Windy`s ingenious dueling. And in the midst of battle, Windy`s hidden brutality is exposed.
Source: crunchyroll

Humanity and Ignis. Playmaker`s heartfelt pleas for coexistence have failed. Revolver`s attacks have firmed the Ignis of Light`s resolution against humanity.
Source: crunchyroll

After an astounding evolution, Bowman displays his new Hi-drive tactics. Playmaker makes predictions based on his previous fights with Bowman, and, taking Ai`s advice into account, attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

The fierce clash of attack and defense continues. Bowman activates the Storm Access skill and gains a new Hi-drive.
Source: crunchyroll

Earth rescues Aqua from imprisonment. Aqua reveals the truth behind the collapse of the Cybers world.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker arrives at Earth`s Duel and notices that there`s something different about Go Onizuka. Having acquired tactic even more powerful than before, Go Onizuka crushes Earth with his Dinowrestlers.
Source: crunchyroll

Aoi has doubts about SOL Technology`s methods. She begins searching for Aqua, whose whereabouts are unknown.
Source: crunchyroll

Determined to protect Aqua, Ghost Girl stands in Blood Shepherd`s way. Enraged by her interference, Blood Shepherd challenges her to a Duel where the loser forfeits their account.
Source: crunchyroll

After learning the shocking plan SOL Technology has been hiding, Blood Shepherd leaves Zaizen and begins an independent search for Ignis. Blood Shepherd`s extraordinary hacking skills attract Revolver`s attention.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 反骨のバウンティーハンター

REGULAR.description:
Wary of Revolver`s secretive maneuvers, Lightning challenges Blood Shepherd, who is conducting an independent search for Ignis, to a Duel.
Source: crunchyroll

Blood Shepherd had the upper hand, locking down all of Lightning`s battle tactics. Then, Lightning summons monsters one after another to engage his drones.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 賞金稼ぎ[バウンティーハンター]の務め

REGULAR.description:
As they were looking into Lightning`s movements, Playmaker and the others find traces of Earth, who had been captured by SOL Technology, inside LINK VRAINS. When they head to where they spotted the traces, they find Go Onizuka waiting for them.
Source: crunchyroll

Go Onizuka has completely changed. Playmaker endures his furious attacks and activates a skill, pushing for a way to turn the tables.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honnou no Saki ni Aru Mono

REGULAR.description:
Playmaker receives word that Revolver wants to talk. He gathers his friends and heads to the designated meeting area.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イレギュラー・ミーティング

REGULAR.description:
Revolver has suggested that he and Playmaker and the others join forces. Shaking with rage, Soulburner commences a Duel with Revolver.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker and the others break into Mirror LINK VRAINS, heading toward Lightning. Meanwhile, on orders from Lightning, Haru stands in Blue Maiden`s path, and commences a Duel with her.
Source: crunchyroll

Lightning has chosen Specter as the next target. Using his Armatos Legio and his Judgement Arrows, he creates an Extra Link and drives Specter into a tight spot.
Source: crunchyroll

Specter has turned the tables by using Lighting`s Judgement Arrows against him and breaking the Extra Link. With his Saint Avalon enveloping the battle zone, Specter aims to carry out the Knights of Hanoi`s mission to destroy the Ignis and launches a fierce attack on Lightning.
Source: crunchyroll

Windy is back. Before settling things with Revolver, he goes to attack Soulburner in order to carry out Lightning`s plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: リベンジャー・ウィンディ

REGULAR.description:
After being attacked again and again by Windy`s Storm Riders, Soulburner is in a desperate situation. And yet, the fire in Soulburner`s heart hasn`t been extinguished.
Source: crunchyroll

Bowman aims to become the next generation of Ignis, and right now he stands in Blue Maiden`s way. Aqua rejects Bowman`s way of thinking. Wanting to recover Miyu`s consciousness, Blue Maiden challenges Bowman to a Duel.
Source: crunchyroll

Bowman has acquired even greater battle skills based on data from all his previous fights. With his evovled Hi-drive, he corners Blue Maiden in the blink of an eye.
Source: crunchyroll

The enemy who has suddenly appeared before Playmaker is none other than the friend he has gone through so much with - Kusanagi Shouichi. Lightning has taken his little brother Jin hostage, and so, with no other choice, Kusanagi challenges Playmaker to a Duel.
Source: crunchyroll

Kusanagi Shouichi has thorough knowledge of Playmaker`s deck. To protect his little brother Jin, Kusanagi launches relentless attacks against Playmaker.
Source: crunchyroll

His battle with Kusanagi has caused Playmaker to lose consciousness. To protect him, Soulburner commences a Duel with Bowman.
Source: crunchyroll

Having attained power beyond human understanding, Bowman boasts that he can control even fortune itself. Soulburner and Flame use the strength of their bonds as a weapon, and their Salamangreat drive Bowman back.
Source: crunchyroll

Revolver tries to entice Lightning to come to him. Through his actions, the crimes Lightning has committed and the real reason behind the creation of Bowman are revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

According to simulations run on different futures of Ignis and humanity, Revolver says that Lightning`s is the only one that leads to mutual destruction.
Source: crunchyroll

Lightning uses Kusanagi Jin as a hostage to rattle Revolver. Disappointed by Lightning`s actions, Bowman decides to step in.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker takes on the hopes and will of his allies. He faces off against Bowman who has completely absorbed the Ignis.
Source: crunchyroll

Bowman has used the consciousness of the people in LINK VRAINS  to create a Data Storm and summon powerful Hi-drive monsters. Playmaker can`t see a way to break through.
Source: crunchyroll

Bowman has used human`s consciousness to create a Data Storm and activate a Neuron Link. Hanoi`s Three Knights, Zaizen, and Ghost Girl put their lives on the line to destroy it.
Source: crunchyroll

Having destroyed a section of the Neuron Link, Ai manages to get into Bowman`s program. There, he finds the five Ignis Bowman had absorbed.
Source: crunchyroll

The fierce battle against Bowman with the fate of the world in the balance has ended. Playmaker releases his allies` consciousnesses with a feeling of relief, but Ai, who used all of his power in the battle, and the Ignis that Bowman absorbed have not returned...
Source: crunchyroll

Through Playmaker and the other`s efforts, peace has returned to Den City. However, Ai has snuck onto a SOL Technology ship with Roboppi trying to get in contact with high ranking officer Queen. What could Ai be after...?
Source: crunchyroll

Ai has attacked SOL Technoloy`s chief operating officer, Queen. He sent notice to Zaizen so that he could steal the code key necessary to infiltrate SOL Tech`s inner system.
Source: crunchyroll

Having firmed his resolve to fight Ai, Playmaker searches for Ai who is targeting Zaizen. What he finds is a copy of Ai created to buy some time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: がんばれ!! ロボッピ

REGULAR.description:
Roboppi uses tricky tactics to corner Ghost Girl and Blood Shepherd. Forced into a difficult situation, Ghost Girl joins forces with Blood Shepherd and summons a new trump card.
Source: crunchyroll

To protect the children in the facility, a restored Go Onizuka launches raging waves of Gouki. The powerful monsters summoned by Ai drive them all back.
Source: crunchyroll

Determined to see the plan through himself, Ai attacks Playmaker`s allies one after another. Finally, he pinpoints the place Zaizen has been hiding.
Source: crunchyroll

Ai has discovered Zaizen and Blue Maiden in the net. He challenges them to a Duel in order to take over SOL Technoloy`s system.
Source: crunchyroll

Each making full use of the other`s battle tactics, Zaizen and Blue Maiden break through Ai`s battle formation. Ai summons a new trump card and drives them back again.
Source: crunchyroll

LINK VRAINS, which is supposed to have been shut down, is suddenly open again. The people of Den City begin logging in all at once.
Source: crunchyroll

Soulburner Duels Roboppi to find out Ai`s location. He tries to convince Roboppi to find a way to live alongside humans.
Source: crunchyroll

Through the Duel with Soulburner, Roboppi evolves, pressing Soulburner with ever-changing tactics. Soulburner endures the fierce blows and launches a counterattack.
Source: crunchyroll

Soulburner receives data regarding Ai. Then, Revolver appears. He`s there to steal the data on Ai in order to put an end to his ties with Ignis with his own two hands.
Source: crunchyroll

As their fierce battle intensifies, Revolver senses the hesitation in Soulburner`s heart and is disappointed by it. His reaction enrages Soulburner who cuts himself free from the pain of the Lost incident and the sadness of losing Flame, and calls a mighty conflagration to his hand!
Source: crunchyroll

Having learned Ai`s whereabouts, Yuusaku heads to an island on the outskirts of Den City alone. Ai has begin making copies of himself using the "SOLtis" developed by SOL Technology.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker evades the onslaught of attacks by the thinnest of margins. He sets up an attack that will take advantage of cracks in Ai`s tactics.
Source: crunchyroll

Playmaker learns of Ai`s profound grief at losing the Ignis. He tries to convince Ai to stop fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

The importance of bonds with humanity and that which AI ultimately seeks. As they see each other`s intentions in a new light, Playmaker and Ai release the last of their power as their fight draws to an end. What future will this Duel lead to...?
Source: crunchyroll
